As I'm sure you know, mind magic is the rarest and hardest to work. Magic on the scale that afflicts us is beyond the scope of any individual—but not a group!

If I'm right, the instructors may be to blame!"The instructors? Impossible!"

It's unthinkable, not impossible. I need you to search the instructors trunks in the eastern classroom on the second floor. There may also be clues in the Athenaeum.

Move quickly! If we cannot regain control of the academy, the federation may destroy it—and everyone in it.

You're back! I hope your mission was successful. I saw the prefects going a little crazier, and it chilled my blood.

Let's see what you found. Hmm. This isn't good, but it may point to a solution.

I've work to do. Power shield you, .
This is no time to dawdle! Children are dying!
